958800.name: Lapse
958800.description:
Lapse is a real time mystery about using time travel to solve your sister's murders.

Yes, murders with an 's'.

Features:

  • Investigate through multiple alternate universes and revisit them to complete challenges and unlock new abilities.

  • Observe and interact with all your crewmates/suspects as they spend the last few minutes before judgment time.

  • Use gifts or guile to get ahead, the more they like you, the more they'll tell you.

  • Or get intrusive, get the information quick and hopefully before you get tossed/locked out of their house.

  • Use your time machine to buy yourself a few more minutes or undo a couple mistakes, just be careful not to fracture reality.
958800.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
